thoughts.text: I think I should use the 'browse_website' command to explore the resources found in the web search results.
thoughts.reasoning: The web search results provided a variety of resources for exploring the universe. Browsing the websites will allow me to explore the resources in more detail and determine which ones will be most useful for my goals.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to visit the websites found in the web search results.
- Explore the resources on each website to determine which ones will be most useful for my goals.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to get sidetracked by interesting but irrelevant information on the websites.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'browse_website' command to explore the resources found in the web search results.

args.question: What are some ways to explore the universe without traveling to the center of the Milky Way?
